pullrequest.title: Add a service caller to rqt dashboard for game controls

content.raw: As it wasn't clear to me if the score would be on a ROS topic in the future (as it could be used to infer the state of the simulation) I didnt add it. We can add it in a follow-up if we think it should be accessed by users
content.html: As it wasn't clear to me if the score would be on a ROS topic in the future (as it could be used to infer the state of the simulation) I didnt add it. We can add it in a follow-up if we think it should be accessed by users
